'''Bedrock Editor v0.7.2''' is a minor alpha release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released on September 11, 2024.<ref>https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/197</ref><ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/30155721026317</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added an initial Editor Settings panel with options for {{cd|ShowInvisibleBlocks}} and {{cd|ShowChunkBoundaries}} to {{cd|GraphicsSettingsPropertyAPI}}.
